workflow.name: aedg_office_hvac_fan_coil_doas
workflow.description: Measure replaces existing HVAC system (if any) with a Fan Coil with DOAS HVAC system (one DOAS per floor).  The fan coil with DOAS system (centralized DOAS, with zone level conditioning) is applied to all space types.  In select cases, the user is given the option to preserve existing HVAC schedules.  In other cases, new schedules are generated that align with AEDG recommendations.  The resulting HVAC system reflects the HVAC recommendations of the 50% Small and Medium Office AEDG.

arguments.display_name: This space type should be part of a ceiling return air plenum.

argument.display_name: Apply recommended availability and ventilation schedules for air handlers?
argument.name: remake_schedules

workflow.name: aedg_office_hvac_vav_dx
workflow.description: Measure replaces existing HVAC system (if any) with a high efficiency multizone variable air volume (VAV) HVAC system (one system per floor).  The multizone VAV system (centralized cooling with zone level heating) is applied to all space types.  In select cases, the user is given the option to preserve existing HVAC schedules.  In other cases, new schedules are generated that align with AEDG recommendations.  The resulting HVAC system reflects the HVAC recommendations of the 50% Small and Medium Office AEDG.

workflow.name: xcel_eda_tariff_selectionand_model_setup
workflow.description: Add the selected Xcel utility rate, as well as set the timestep and lifecycle costing parameters as required by the Xcel EDA program.

workflow.name: openstudio_results
workflow.description: This measure creates high level tables and charts pulling both from model inputs and EnergyPlus results. It has building level information as well as detail on space types, thermal zones, HVAC systems, envelope characteristics, and economics. Click the heading above a chart to view a table of the chart data.
